creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: somewhat abstract scene; white, rippled moon in upper center amidst green, teal, and purple background; tall black column along R edge; choppy, almost reef-like vertical black lines rising from bottom to center of image
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Nocturnal
